description: by Father Murtaugh O'Lavery. Priest of the parishes of St John's, Dromore, and Machrelin. Upon the death of one of his parishioners. To which is added, The consecration of a murderer of heretick princes; used by the Jesuits in Popish countries.| Father Murtaugh O'Lavery is a pseudonym.| On title page : Vivit post funera virtus. Anno 1747.
